text:
httpd-2.0 - from cvs
if you want to upgrade apr and apr-util from cvs, this patch is needed if you
want compile apache after that. I wrote a patch.
creator: perry@csk.pl

text:
the httpd 2.0 branch uses the APR and APR-Util 0.9.X branch from CVS, not CVS head.

For APR use:
cvs checkout -r APR_0_9_BRANCH apr

For APR-Util ur:
cvs checkout -r APU_0_9_BRANCH apr-util

More details about using Apache from CVS are at:
http://httpd.apache.org/dev/anoncvs.txt
creator: chip@force-elite.com
